snippet: The N.H.L. and the players union met in New York for a fourth straight day as the talks between the two sides intensified on Day 55 of the lockout.
abstract: Little progress is made in fourth consecutive day of contract negotiations between NHL and players' union, as controversy intensifies over contents of a leaked union memorandum.
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. and the players union met in New York for a fourth straight day as the talks between the two sides intensified on Day 55 of the lockout.

headline.seo: Leaked Memo Could Complicate N.H.L. Labor Talks
headline.main: A Leaked Memo Could Complicate the N.H.L. Labor Talks
headline.print_headline: A Leaked Memo Could Complicate the N.H.L. Labor Talks
